channel.title: Music Theory on Simba Tango
channel.description: Recent content in Music Theory on Simba Tango

item.title: What to listen for in tango
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: by ~Oryctes~ Knowing what to listen for can greatly improve how much you appreciate music. I had the opportunity to attend a workshop with Ignacio Varchausky on listening to tango music. It was very interesting, and it turned out that it corresponded with a post I was planning to write as soon as I got back to my copy of Aaron Copland’s What to listen for in music.

item.title: Why we never tire of tango music
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
